recipe.title: Apple Pie
recipe.comment: If you hate rolling pastry, but love home made style, this is a good one for you!
recipe.ingredient: Tin of ready apple pie filling (if you want to cheat)
recipe.step: Cream sugar and butter, then add egg.
Add flour and salt, then milk 1/3 cup first then if it seems dry add the rest to make up to 1/2 cup.
Divide in two and roll into balls and wrap in glad wrap and refrigerate for at least an hour.
Prepare dish by greasing with a little butter and use your hands to push one ball into the dish to make the base.
Pour in apple and make flat with the back of a spoon.
Grate the other ball until all used up and top completely covered.
Cook in slow oven for one hour.
Serve with ice cream and/or cream.
